panels.title: ClearBlade HTTP Responses Rate (average per second)
Console HTTP Response Rate (average per second)
HAProxy Persistent Connections Sum Across Nodes

targets.expr: sum by(connection_type)(clearblade_mqtt_current_connections{connection_type!="all_connections"{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}, cluster_name="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}" {{ end }}} + on(instance) group_left(nodename) (sum by(instance,nodename) (node_uname_info)) -1)

panels.title: MQTT Active  Connections Sum Across Nodes

targets.expr: sum(rate(pg_stat_database_xact_commit{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}{cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}"} {{ end }}[5m])) + sum(rate(pg_stat_database_xact_rollback{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}{cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}"} {{ end }}[5m]))

(clearblade_http_requests{type="failed_requests"{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}, cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}" {{ end }}}/ ignoring(type) clearblade_http_requests{type="total_requests"{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}, cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}" {{ end }}}) * 100

panels.title: Successful HTTP Requests By Endpoint (within 1h window)
Failed HTTP Requests By Endpoint (with 1h window)
Currently Running Code Services By Service Name

targets.expr: clearblade_stream_services_failed_services{service_name!="all_services"{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}, cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}" {{ end }}} + on(instance) group_left(nodename) (sum by(instance,nodename) (node_uname_info)) -1

panels.title: Successful Triggers (5 min window) By System Key/Trigger Name
Failed Triggers (5 min window) By System Key/Trigger Name

targets.expr: sum by(system_key, timer_name, service_name) (increase(clearblade_timers_successful{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}{cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}"} {{ end }}[5m]))

panels.title: Successful Timers (5 min window) By System Key, Timer Name, Service Name

targets.expr: sum by (system_key, timer_name, service_name) (increase(clearblade_timers_failed{{ if .Values.grafana.clusterName }}{cluster="{{ .Values.grafana.clusterName }}"} {{ end }}[5m]))

panels.title: Failed Timers (5 min window) By System Key, Timer Name, Service Name
